fr:title.text: The total category and its projection

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: The total category and its projection

fr:mainmatter.html:p: Note that any displayed category E over B can be viewed as an undisplayed category \widetilde {E} equipped with a projection functor p_{E}: \widetilde {E}\to B; in this case \widetilde {E} is called the total category of E.

html:ol.html:li: An object of \widetilde {E} is given by a pair (x,\bar {x}) where x\in B and \bar {x}\in E_{x}.
A morphism {(x,\bar {x})}\xrightarrow {{}}{(y,\bar {y})} in \widetilde {E} is given by a pair (f,\bar {f}) where {x}\xrightarrow {{f}}{y} and {\bar {x}}\xrightarrow [f]{\bar {f}}{\bar {y}}:\bar {x}.

fr:mainmatter.html:p: The construction of the total category of a displayed category is called the Grothendieck construction.
